meanings.sent1: The maturation of the fruit took several weeks.
meanings.sent2: Her maturation into a responsible adult was evident in her actions.
meanings.sent3: The maturation of the cheese made it stink, but taste delicious.
meanings.sent4: The maturation of his skills was like watching a caterpillar transform into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The maturation of the wine gave it a rich and complex flavor.

meanings.definition: The act or process of maturing.
meanings.sent1: The maturation of the idea required careful planning.
meanings.sent2: His maturation as a leader was evident in his decision-making.
meanings.sent3: The maturation of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The maturation of the relationship was like a flower blooming in spring.
meanings.sent5: The maturation of the project brought it to a successful completion.

meanings.sent1: Her maturation was evident in her wise words.
meanings.sent2: The maturation of the company led to its success.
meanings.sent3: The maturation of the puppy made it less mischievous.
meanings.sent4: The maturation of the tree was a symbol of strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The maturation of his character made him a role model for others.
